title: So the new champ teaser broke the NA server
body:
Taliyah is just so strong that even the mention of her causes the NA servers to go _rocky._

..... Sorry.....

replies.body: They hit rock bottom with this one
That's why I had to apologize for the groundbreaking discovery.

> [{quoted}](name=Rman127,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Q8KQjoFJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-29T00:06:15.641+0000)
>
> That's why I had to apologize for the groundbreaking discovery.

http://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2011/11/14/article-2061562-0ECD064800000578-564_634x286.jpg

Rock yea you did.

'Twas an _earth shatterin'_ discovery for us 'ere back in Fiddler's Green when that happened.

Th' folks, maidens, an' drunkards 'ere didn't put 'eir proposed coin for RP due to th' servers goin' to shite-town so a number of fair-folk 'ere have gone back to 'eir tavern parties, accidentally blowin' places half to The Seven Hells with _Bacadri 151,_ devolvin' back in th' evolutionary tree with 'eir pre-abandoned Jenkem addictions, an' fallin' back to commitin' an'/or obfuscatin' stupidity with Jack Sparrow impersonations an' NSFW _One Piece_ fan art...

The Drowned God only knows Terra must be havin' a blast with her work on th' servers after her teaser on th' _League_ site... Th' crafty but memorable wench...

In before Bronze Taliyah flames team for being bad

-'Relax Taliyah you're making a mountain out of a molehill'

nothing just being an Rman xD
FEELSGOODMAN{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
oh and waiting for the NA servers to work so i can log in....

Just cobbling up some support for Taliyah...
http://s32.postimg.org/j6tyshihh/karma.jpg
